summary: It's April 5, 1941, somewhere in Serbia. A group of people go on a bus to Belgrade, on a journey that will change their lives forever.
cast: Pavle Vuisic|Dragan Nikolic|Danilo 'Bata' Stojkovic|Aleksandar Bercek|Neda Arneric|Milivoje 'Mica' Tomic|Tasko Nacic|Boro Stjepanovic|Slavko Stimac|Miodrag Kostic|Nenad Kostic|Bora Todorovic|Slobodan Aligrudic|Petar Lupa|Stanojlo Milinkovic|Ljubomir Cipranic|Djenadija Rogic|Milovan Tasic
